home.descripcion: Enthusiast of analysis and programming, always looking for new challenges to grow personally and professionally in the exciting IT world. With a positive attitude and an open mind, I am ready to face any obstacle and make the most of the opportunities that arise in the IT field.

about me.p1: I currently reside in Posadas, Misiones (Argentina), where I am in the last year of my Systems Analysis degree, which gives me a solid foundation in technology.
about me.p2: My trajectory in the IT world has led me to acquire skills in various technologies through courses and self-learning.
about me.p3: My approach to any challenge is to always look for innovative and effective solutions, while collaborating as a team to achieve exceptional results.

services.p analisis: I identify customer needs and transform them into detailed technical specifications. I focus on getting to know the processes in depth to design effective solutions.
services.p desarrollo: I translate specifications into functional and efficient code. My goal is to deliver solutions that meet quality standards and satisfy the customer's expectations.
services.p mantenimiento: I perform comprehensive maintenance of computer systems development and hardware equipment. From optimization and updates of operating systems to cleaning and technical adjustments.

projects.p calculadora: Web calculator for mathematical operations. Which performs operations of addition, subtraction, division and multiplication.
projects.p tienda online: Online sales platform for e-commerce of electronic products. In which different modules of administration, sales and stock control were included. We also implemented the Mercado Pago API as a payment method to offer customers a secure shopping experience.
projects.p gestion medica: Web-based system for a professional medical clinic. It includes essential functions such as appointment scheduling, registration and access to patient records, and an online messaging platform for medical staff and patients.
projects.p gimnasio: Project developed for a gym, providing a complete set of tools for both the teacher and their clients. It includes features such as the management of training routines and nutrition in order to provide a comprehensive and effective experience for all users.

footer.p text: Share your idea with me and let's work together!
